item.title: Travel Assistance Committee - TAC
item.description: Travel Assistance Committee ¶ Events currently being supported by TAC ¶ Currently supported events ¶ Community Over Code EU 2024 Community Over Code Asia 2024 Community Over Code NA 2024 Community Over Code EU 2024 ¶ Applications are closed for EU, thanks to all who submitted. Community Over Code Asia 2024 ¶ Applications are now open! Please head on over to our app and apply now. Advice for those that will need a Visa - apply for that too now in case on delays getting an appointment.

item.title: Travel Assistance Committee - TAC
item.description: Travel Assistance Committee Past events Previous events that TAC supported Community Over Code NA 2023, Halifax, Canada Berlin Buzzwords 2023, Berlin, Germany ApacheCon NA 2022, New Orleans, Louisiana Fosdem 2020, Brussels, Belgium ApacheCon EU 2019, Berlin, Germany ApacheCon NA 2019, Las Vegas, Nevada ApacheCon NA 2018, Montreal, Canada ApacheCon NA 2017, Miami, Florida ApacheCon EU 2016, Seville, Spain ApacheCon NA 2016, Vancouver, Canada ApacheCon EU 2015, Budapest, Hungary ApacheCon NA 2015, Austin, Texas ApacheCon EU 2014, Budapest, Hungary ApacheCon NA 2014, Denver Colorado ApacheCon NA 2013, Portland Oregon ApacheCon Europe 2012, Sinsheim, Germany ApacheCon NA 2011, Vancouver Apache Retreat Ireland 2011 ApacheCon NA 2010, Atlanta Apache Retreat Hursley 2010 Apache Retreat Ireland 2010 ApacheCon US 2009 Oakland ApacheCon EU 2009 Amsterdam ApacheCon US 2008 New Orleans
